ygData.subject: The Dark Avian and the battle commencing.
ygData.msgSnippet: Darkwing hits the water hard from the shots and Ragus s attack. Transforming underwater to his robot mode he comes up with his arms in the air.  Dreadwind

Subject: The Dark Avian and the battle commencing.
Message-ID: <3B83ECCF.22400.10C1FED@localhost>
Priority: normal
X-mailer: Pegasus Mail for Win32 (v3.12c)
From: gunthers@...

Darkwing hits the water hard from the shots and Ragus's attack.  
Transforming underwater to his robot mode he comes up with his 
arms in the air.  Dreadwind lands beside him throwing his hands in 
the air as well.  "WE SURRENDER" they yelled in unison, hoping 
that no more damge would become of them.

Meanwhile in Autofire, Firestrike looks around.  "We must report to 
Megatron immediatly." he said in his loyal voice adn mindset.

And off in the the vast distance Havotron smiles as Phebus brings 
up the picture from Dreadwinds eyes.  Everything was going 
according to plans, he thought.
